title: Without a Sound
description: FROM NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLING AUTHOR...What does she see? What does she know? Who should she fear? Haley Lambert has moved back to her Kansas City childhood home to care for her orphaned niece, Molly—and to find the monster who murdered her own sister. Molly may have witnessed her mother’s murder, but whatever the little girl saw on that faithful night, she isn’t talking. Now, with the killer still loose, another game of hide-and-seek is about to begin.
author: Carla Cassidy
